price: Sọ pé: “Ẹni tí Ó ṣẹ̀dá rẹ̀ nígbà àkọ́kọ́ l’Ó máa sọ ọ́ di alààyè. Òun sì ni Onímọ̀ nípa gbogbo ẹ̀dá.
arabic: قُلۡ يُحۡيِيهَا ٱلَّذِيٓ أَنشَأَهَآ أَوَّلَ مَرَّةٖۖ وَهُوَ بِكُلِّ خَلۡقٍ عَلِيمٌ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: qul yuḥ'yīhā alladhī ansha-ahā awwala marratin wahuwa bikulli khalqin ʿalīmun
